backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining card, user profile, and portfolio types with access control plus functions to add and retrieve user-specific cards.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to two state‑sync and UI‑update requirements with component metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark OKLCH color palettes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity, actor initialization, profile loading timeouts, and rendering tabs for portfolio and cards.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog form for adding a card with free‑text fields, autocomplete suggestions, and submission via useAddCard.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: A text input with filtered autocomplete suggestions and click-outside handling.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a card with rarity styling, pricing, actions, and dialogs for editing, selling, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Modal showing crafted cards with rarity, metadata, and purchase info fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Dialog form for editing card fields, handling sale values, dates, and updating via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches UI errors and shows a reloadable error message with optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, user greeting, and login/logout handling via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Always-open modal prompting new users to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog component for selling or trading a card, including form handling, rarity styling helpers, and new-card creation logic.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal for viewing sold and traded cards, including profit/loss calculations and expandable trade groups.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralized factory for generating principal-scoped React Query keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Exposes React Query state for actor initialization with helper booleans and manual retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for Google authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, identity persistence, and provider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, cards, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Displays the user's cards with extensive filtering options and an add-card dialog, using React Query data and memoized filter logic.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows portfolio metrics derived from a snapshot query, includes transaction counts and modal views for sold and crafted cards.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Provides helper functions to extract unique card field values and generate filtered text suggestions for form inputs.
frontend/src/utils/redactSecrets.ts: Redacts sensitive values in strings and Error objects to prevent secret exposure in logs or UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing known issues, feature requests, and metadata for the Sorare Portfolio project.
